trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging" /> events of the root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos de evento que se usan como objeto de parámetro de los eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged" /> y <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging" /> del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> raíz.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase se expone como la `e` parámetro en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> evento se desencadena antes de que se muestra una nueva vista, cuando el usuario final, haga clic y arrastre en un área del gráfico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> evento se desencadena después de que se crea la nueva vista.

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Es importante tener en cuenta que la posición y el tamaño de una vista no se puede establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> eventos porque en este caso la vista ya está creada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs> class contains the following properties:
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs> clase contiene las siguientes propiedades:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> propiedad, que se utiliza para obtener la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objeto en que se está mostrando la vista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> propiedad obtiene el nombre del área del gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: También se pueden establecer otras propiedades del área de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> propiedad, que se utiliza para obtener el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> objeto con el que está asociada la vista.

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar el tipo de eje, que puede ser X, Y, X2 o Y2, use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: También se pueden establecer otras propiedades del eje.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> propiedad, que representa la nueva posición de una vista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> propiedad, que representa el nuevo tamaño de una vista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> propiedad, que representa la unidad de medida para el tamaño de una vista.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.ViewEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.ViewEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Eje de la vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: Posición inicial de la nueva vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.ViewEventArgs" /> class with the specified <paramref name="axis" /> and <paramref name="newPosition" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.ViewEventArgs" /> con los parámetros <paramref name="axis" /> y <paramref name="newPosition" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Eje de la vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: Posición inicial de la nueva vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: Tamaño de la nueva vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: Unidad de medida para el tamaño de la nueva vista de escala.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.ViewEventArgs" /> class with the specified <paramref name="axis" />, <paramref name="newPosition" />, <paramref name="newSize" /> and <paramref name="newSizeType" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.ViewEventArgs" /> con los parámetros <paramref name="axis" />, <paramref name="newPosition" />, <paramref name="newSize" /> y <paramref name="newSizeType" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> al que pertenece una vista.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> que representa el eje al que pertenece una vista.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se expone en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> eventos de la raíz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to:
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad puede utilizarse para:

trans-unit.source: Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Determinar el tipo de eje, X, X2, Y o Y2, que se produce el evento, mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Obtener y establecer las propiedades del eje, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> al que pertenece una vista.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> que representa el área del gráfico a la que pertenece una vista.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se expone en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> eventos de la raíz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> propiedad puede utilizarse para determinar el área de gráfico a la que pertenece la vista, mediante el acceso a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad también puede utilizarse para obtener y establecer propiedades del área de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la nueva posición de una vista a lo largo de un eje.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="double" /> que representa la posición de una vista a lo largo de un eje, que es la parte inferior de una vista vertical o la posición izquierda de una vista horizontal.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se expone en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> eventos de la raíz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> de objetos y representa la nueva posición de una vista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> propiedad puede establecerse en un nuevo valor en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> eventos, pero no puede establecerse en un nuevo valor para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> eventos porque en este caso la vista ya está creada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> siempre se mide como un valor del eje.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tamaño de una vista a lo largo de un eje.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="double" /> que representa el tamaño de una vista a lo largo de un eje.

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño es el alto de la vista vertical o el ancho de la vista horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la unidad de medida del nuevo tamaño de una vista.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize" /> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: Valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> que representa la unidad de medida para la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize" />, que representa el ancho o alto de una vista de datos.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: Cuando esta propiedad se establece en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>, la unidad de medida para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> propiedad viene determinada automáticamente por el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> controlar, y será un número o un día.

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: Recuerde que el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> propiedad siempre se mide como un valor del eje.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de que, si se establece explícitamente el tipo de tamaño, el tipo coincide con el eje al que pertenece la barra de desplazamiento.

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Minutes> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: En otras palabras, no especifique <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Minutes> si no usa el eje <xref:System.DateTime> valores.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> propiedad puede establecerse en un nuevo valor en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> eventos, pero no puede establecerse en un nuevo valor para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> eventos porque ya se ha creado la vista.
